We are a brand born of a love for the beauty of restraint in design, the inherent grace of feminine strength, and the necessity to treat our environment and each other with love and respect.
We are a brand born of a love for the beauty of restraint in design, the inherent grace of feminine strength, and the necessity to treat our environment and each other with love and respect.
Each of our carefully researched, styled, tested and distributed collections reflects a particular aesthetic and ethos. We hope some of these speak to your own style, and help you refine and redefine your own look and style philosophy in the process.
Each of our carefully researched, styled, tested and distributed collections reflects a particular aesthetic and ethos. We hope some of these speak to your own style, and help you refine and redefine your own look and style philosophy in the process.
Mascarilla facial que absorbe el exceso de grasa e impurezas. Deja la piel limpia y sin brillos. Apto para veganos.
Certificado por Ecocert Cosmos Organic.
Natura Bio es una marca de cosmética natural y certificada ecológica, originaria de Terrassa (Barcelona). Nos ofrece una amplia gama de productos de alta calidad con un coste asequible. Podemos encontrar línea facial para todo tipo de piel y edad, corporal e incluso accesorios de madera.
Aplicar sobre la piel de la cara, con la ayuda de un pincel o con los dedos 1 o 2 veces por semana. Dejar actuar 5 minutos y aclarar con abundante agua. Evitar la zona del contorno de los ojos.
Éste será tu NEWSLETTER preferido.
Te explicaremos todas las novedades, ofertas y tips más TOP de la cosmética más COOL.
